name: Patissciel Couverture
text:
2 Pendulum Monsters
If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: If you have no card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can place 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Patissciel Couverture" once per turn.
